data.title: BraceFace Promotions
data.text:
About Braceface

Since 1990, theLogoShop has been providing promotional products and decorated apparel to businesses, schools, clubs, sports teams, church groups and individuals. Serving the Logan community, we began as a small, two person operation selling bags and have grown into nearly 20 employees. We offer a multitude of promotional products and decorating services, helping businesses in Northern Utah to market and grow their customer base with quality products and services. We are sincerely committed to each and every one of our customers, whether they are with large corporations or someone who comes in off the street, striving to provide the best there is to offer in quality items and outstanding customer service. We work as hard as we possibly can to make every customer that comes through our doors happy.

Our mantra is “We Logo Stuff”, and that’s exactly what we set out to do. Whether you want office supplies such as pens, pencils, sticky notes or computer accessories, we can get it with your logo on it. If you’re looking for a specific item geared to your industry, we’re happy to go searching and find it for you. There are numerous possibilities when it comes to products sporting a logo - and if it’s out there, we’ll locate it and get it done!

We are currently one of the largest promotional products distributors in Northern Utah and are fully equipped on site to decorate apparel with both silk-screening and embroidery processes. We are a member in good standing of ASI (Advertising Specialty Industry) and PPAI (Promotional Products Advertising Industry). We process orders for a number of different websites.

We employ students and graduates of Utah State University, located here in Logan, and sponsor many of the teams, events and clubs on campus. Currently we operate a small retail store called Locker 42 (also available online at www.locker42.com) in which we specialize in Utah State University gear and in doing so are licensed with Collegiate Licensing Company (CLC).

We are located downtown in beautiful Logan near the eastern edge of Cache Valley in Northern Utah. Logan was founded in 1869 and in 2005 and 2007, was declared the safest metropolitan area in the United States. Our city is headquarters to several large companies and birthplace to quite a few notable people. Information listed here as well as other notable information on Logan, Utah is available on the Wikipedia website.

If you have any questions about our organization, please feel free to contact us at the above listed address and phone number, or you can reach us by e-mail. We are available to take your calls Monday through Friday, 8:30 am until 5:30 pm MST. If you reach us after business hours, please leave us a detailed message including your order number and the name of the website, and we will return your call the following business day.
